  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addContainer(Container container)
     
    Folder
    addFolderToCurrentParent(String name, HashMap<Account,Permission> permissions)
    add a folder to the current parent if current parent is root, the account will have edit permission if the account is not in the current parent's permissions, it will throw an exception if the account is in the current parent's permissions, it will have the same permission as the parent
    Item
    addItemToCurrentParent(String name, String description, String longText, ArrayList<String> imgs, HashMap<Account,Permission> permissions)
    add an item to the current parent if current parent is root, the account will have edit permission if the account is not in the current parent's permissions, it will throw an exception if the account is in the current parent's permissions, it will have the same permission as the parent
    void
    addTree(String root, Folder innerParent)
    add a full tree to the current parent from the file system if the account is not in the current parent's permissions, it will throw an exception if the account is in the current parent's permissions, it will have the same permission as the parent
    void
    deleteAccount()
     
    void
    deleteCurrent()
    delete the current container

    get the containers from the given parent that the account has access to if the parent is null, it will return the root containers
    Folder
    getCurrentParent()
     
    ArrayList<String>
    getSuggestions()
     
    void
    logout()
    log out the account
    ArrayList<Container>
    openContainer(String name)
    open a container with the given name from the current parent if the name is null or empty, it will return the current parent's children if the name is "..", it will move back to the parent if the account is not in the container's permissions, it will throw an exception if the account is in the container's permissions, it will return the children of the container
    ArrayList<Container>
    openContainer(String name, String query)
    open a container with the given name from the current parent if the name is null or empty, it will return the current parent's children if the name is "..", it will move back to the parent if the account is not in the container's permissions, it will throw an exception if the account is in the container's permissions, it will return the children of the container
    Item
    openItem(String name)
    open an item with the given name from the current parent if the account is not in the current parent's permissions, it will throw an exception if the account is in the current parent's permissions, it will return the item if the container is a folder, it will throw an exception if the container is not found, it will return null
    protected void
    sort()
    sort the containers
    void
    sortBy(Comparator<Container> comparator)
    set the default sorting method and sort the containers

    • openContainer

      public ArrayList<Container> openContainer(String name, String query) throws Exception
      open a container with the given name from the current parent if the name is null or empty, it will return the current parent's children if the name is "..", it will move back to the parent if the account is not in the container's permissions, it will throw an exception if the account is in the container's permissions, it will return the children of the container
      Parameters:

      public Item openItem(String name) throws Exception

    • addTree

      public void addTree(String root, Folder innerParent) throws Exception
      add a full tree to the current parent from the file system if the account is not in the current parent's permissions, it will throw an exception if the account is in the current parent's permissions, it will have the same permission as the parent
      Parameters:
      root - absolute path to the root folder
      innerParent - innitially null
      Throws:
      Exception
